price: Hakika mimi kwenu ni Mtume muaminifu kwenu.
footnotes: Hakika mimi nimetumwa kwenu na Mwenyezi Mungu nikuleteeni Dini ya Haki. Nami ni muaminifu wa kuifikisha Dini hii.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
